Wisdom: الْعَقْلُ إغناء [أَغْنَى الْغَنَاءِ وَغَايَةُ الشَّرَفِ فِي الْآخِرَةِ وَالدُّنْيَا
enWisdom: The intellect is the greatest of riches and the highest honour in [both] the Hereafter and this world
The greatest of all riches is the intellect
The wealth of an intelligent person is in his knowledge and his action
There is no possession more beneficial than intellect

Wisdom: عَلَيْكَ بِالْعَقْلِ فَلَا مَالَ أَعُودَ مِنْهُ
enWisdom: You must develop your intellect, for there is no wealth more profitable than it
There is no poverty for the intelligent one
